hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export GOPATH=`pwd` whoami
#Install dependencies zypper update -y zypper install -y java-1_7_0-openjdk make gcc wget tar git unzip
cat /etc/os* java -version
#Install Nodejs v4+ cd $GOPATH wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/8.9.0.0/linux/s390x/ibm-8.9.0.0-node-v8.9.0-linux-s390x.bin chmod +x ibm-8.9.0.0-node-v8.9.0-linux-s390x.bin echo -e "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=/root/ibm/node\n-fileOverwrite_/root/ibm/node/_node_installation/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties ./ibm-8.9.0.0-node-v8.9.0-linux-s390x.bin -f installer.properties -i silent
export PATH=$PATH:/root/ibm/node/bin node -v
#Install Golang
cd $GOPATH zypper install -y tar wget gcc wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin cd /usr/bin/ ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc
go version
#Install Grafana cd $GOPATH mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana git clone https://github.com/grafana/grafana.git cd grafana git checkout v4.6.3
cd ./vendor/github.com/klauspost/compress/gzip cp gunzip.go gunzip.go.copy cp gzip.go gzip.go.copy
#Edit the file vendor/github.com/klauspost/compress/gzip/gunzip.go sed -i '17d ' gunzip.go sed -i "17 i \\\t\"hash/crc32\"" gunzip.go
#Edit the file vendor/github.com/klauspost/compress/gzip/gzip.go sed -i '14d ' gzip.go sed -i "14 i \\\t\"hash/crc32\"" gzip.go git diff cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana/grafana #Build Grafana-backend make deps-go make build-go
#Build Grafana frontend assets #Install PhantomJS cd $GOPATH
zypper install -y gcc gcc-c++ make flex bison gperf ruby openssl-devel freetype-devel fontconfig-devel libicu-devel sqlite-devel libpng-devel libjpeg-devel python python-devel python-setuptools git xorg-x11-devel xorg-x11-essentials xorg-x11-fonts xorg-x11 xorg-x11-util-devel libXfont-devel libXfont1 python-pytz
easy_install argparse git clone git://github.com/ariya/phantomjs.git cd phantomjs git checkout 2.1.1 python build.py #Executed test cases in PhantomJS published recipe and in eco0017 jobs, and its running fine so skipped testing phatomjs step. export PATH=$GOPATH/phantomjs/bin:$PATH phantomjs --version python --version
#Install Yarn cd /opt wget https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/releases/download/v1.3.2/yarn-v1.3.2.tar.gz tar zvxf yarn-v1.3.2.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/opt/yarn-v1.3.2/bin
#Install Grunt cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana/grafana/ npm install grunt
#Build the components cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana/grafana/ make deps-js make build-js
zypper install -y curl ./bin/grafana-server & sleep 20s curl http://localhost:3000/login sleep 20s
pgrep -d" " -f "grafana-server" | xargs kill || true sleep 20s #Testing
#Test backend make test-go
#Test frontend make test-js 2>&1 | tee testlogs && grep 'Warning: Task "karma:test" ' testlogs > generated_failures cut -d ' ' -f1-3 generated_failures > generated_failures1 echo ' Warning: Task "karma:test" ' > expected_failures diff -u --ignore-all-space generated_failures1 expected_failures
$GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana/grafana/bin/grafana-server -v
$GOPATH/src/github.com/grafana/grafana/bin/grafana-cli -v
